condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: The WASH Programme continued to provide high-level technical support to UNICEF's Country Programme implementation and overall WASH sector country-wide. This support resulted in key achievements in both upstream and field level programme results highlighted under relevant outputs 1-3 above. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019
